https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/twaMqJbdHGiJtFIRKAEmepH3xIS.jpg Teddy (Eric Tsang) is a ladies man. He is constantly with a woman, but never accepts the responsibility that comes with a relationship. Short of cash, his friend Wendy (Jo Koo) comes up with a plan for him to impart his knowledge in hitching up women to desperate men who will pay for some tips. Beauty and the 7 Beasts
